effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 269,447 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 132,191.
(4) Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 775 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 775 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to destabilize the void energy, releasing a corrupted fragment. Retrieving a fragment briefly infuses you with its power, increasing your Intellect by 7,391 for 15 sec.
